docstring:
"""
    Provide the ability to retrieve a single object for further manipulation.
    """
name: SingleObjectMixin

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return the object the view is displaying.

        Require `self.queryset` and a `pk` or `slug` argument in the URLconf.
        Subclasses can override this to return any object.
        """
methods.name: get_object

methods.docstring:
"""
        Return the `QuerySet` that will be used to look up the object.

        This method is called by the default implementation of get_object() and
        may not be called if get_object() is overridden.
        """
methods.name: get_queryset

methods.docstring: """Get the name of a slug field to be used to look up by slug."""
methods.name: get_slug_field

methods.docstring: """Get the name to use for the object."""
methods.name: get_context_object_name

methods.docstring: """Insert the single object into the context dict."""
methods.name: get_context_data
